entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
